items.title: Roof collapse at Dominican Republic nightclub kills dozens
items.description: Rescue workers are searching for survivors beneath the rubble of the nightclub in Santo Domingo.

items.title: Fifty hippos killed by anthrax in DR Congo
items.description: Efforts are now under way to recover the animals and bury them to prevent further spread.

items.title: Global executions at highest level since 2015, report says
items.description: But Amnesty International also says only 15 countries carried out the death penalty, the lowest on record

items.title: Albanese and Dutton face-off in first Australia election debate
items.description: Cost of living issues dominated the debate and the political rivals were asked about Trump's tariffs.

items.title: South Sudan to accept man deported from US in bid to defuse visa row
items.description: The government initially denied entry to the man, saying he was Congolese, not South Sudanese.
